componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
{{#if Recipient.FirstName}} Assalamu alaykum Dear {{Recipient.FirstName}}, {{else}} Assalamu alaykum {{/if}}

At our Human Appeal offices around the globe, we’re already busy preparing for Eid al-Adha. SubhanAllah, we’re already less than one month away from the blessed first 10 days of Dhul Hijjah! 

Each night, one in nine people will go to bed hungry, and we’re working hard to fight malnutrition, hunger, and food insecurity through our Qurbani campaign.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: How did your donations help us to support the most vulnerable people last year?

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
In all, you supported a massive 401,006 people with fresh nutritious meat across nine territories: Bangladesh, India, Iraq, Pakistan, Pakistan-administered Kashmir, Palestine, Somalia, Syria, and Yemen. 

If you donated your Qurbani with Human Appeal last year, you provided, on average, about 16 kilograms of meat, split between 4 families. May Allah reward your generosity in abundance.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Your Qurbani in figures

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• 401,006 people received fresh mutton, veal, or beef
  • 70,636 families supported
  • 16.12 kgs per Qurbani on average
  • 4.12 kg of meat per family on average

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Fighting malnutrition in Yemen

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
A staggering 47% of children in Yemen are malnourished, and almost 80% of Yemenis need support. The figures are hard to comprehend – 24 million people need humanitarian aid – more than triple the entire population of London.

Last Eid al-Adha, you provided 20,622 Yemenis with fresh, nutritious meat, and helped us to fight malnutrition in Yemen.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The power of Qurbani

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Not only does the Qurbani sacrifice continue the legacy of the prophets, but it also helps to nourish the most vulnerable people during their most fragile times of need. Last year, your Qurbani helped to fight malnutrition in Yemen, supported Rohingya families facing persecution, nourished people in Syria, where food prices have doubled, and helped Somalis to recover from a drought that decimated food and livestock. 

Your donations also helped to support the most vulnerable at at-risk families to stay fed as they struggled to find work during the COVID-19 pandemic.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Help us double our impact this year

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This year, we’ll be supporting vulnerable people across 11 countries, including families in Gaza still unable to recover from the bombings in May, families in Somalia, where 2 million are at risk of starvation due to crop failure, and families in Yemen, experiencing malnutrition, cholera, and war.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: 30 years of providing quality Qurbani

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
We’re honoured that you entrusted your blessed Qurbani donations to Human Appeal, and we hope that you’ll choose to give through us again this year. 

Human Appeal has 30 years’ experience delivering Qurbani. Our local staff work with community farmers to source, check, and screen healthy animals, making sure that every animal has been cared for in accordance with Islamic principles. Just like last year, we’ll be observing local and World Health Organisation guidelines on pandemic safety.
 
Follow in the footsteps of the prophets. Give your Qurbani with Human Appeal this year and help us continue fighting hunger.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Thank you,

JakaAllah khair
newsletter@humanappeal.org.uk
The Human Appeal Team
